                                                                                                                  The following consultancy services (112-119) which are related to HIV/AIDS are added under SHARP. Based on the Aide Memoire dated January 24 –February 4, 2012: the AHAPP grant will close by June 30, 2012, MOPH and the Bank agreed on the transition of the key contracts of the HIV/AIDS program to SHARP for financing till September, 2013.

                                                                      The following Positions/individuals (IC 83-92) which are related to HIV/AIDS program are added under SHARP. Based on the Aide Memoire dated January 24 –February 4, 2012: the AHAPP grant will close by June 30, 2012, MOPH and the Bank agreed on the transition of the key TA positions of the HIV/AIDS program to SHARP for financing till September, 2013.
